completion_message:
## YOU DID IT.

You've created an Aragon Voting application. 

Now, download the code and build on the work you've done!
details:
## Update our Vote

Keep in mind that if a vote is already cast we should already have it in our state from a `VoteCreated` event.

To uniquely identify a vote, we can use the `id` property.
task:
## Vote Cast

Our final task is to update when a voter casts their vote. We'll need to make sure to find that vote and reload it from our smart contract state.
title: Vote Cast Event
